rightCode:
arr = [1, 2, "@lukas.ode", 4, "@jiriukropec"]
filtered_arr = []
for x in arr:
    if isinstance(x, int):
        filtered_arr.append(x)
sum_result = sum(filtered_arr)
print(f"Originál: {arr}")
print(f"Filtrovanej: {filtered_arr}")
print(f"Součet všech čísel: {sum_result}")
